video.title: Star Trek: TNG
video.synopsis: Decades after the adventures of the Enterprise crew, Capt. Jean-Luc Picard leads the new Enterprise on missions of discovery in this sci-fi series.

episodes.synopsis: The new starship Enterprise and its crew's first mission is to explore the mystery surrounding the creation of Farpoint station on planet Deneb IV.
episodes.title: Encounter at Farpoint: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise is infected with a virus that causes them to behave as though they were intoxicated.
episodes.title: The Naked Now

episodes.synopsis: When the leader of an alien culture takes a romantic interest in Lt. Yar, he claims her for his own, to the dismay of his own wife.
episodes.title: Code of Honor

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a race known as the Ferengi, a race believed to be more like pirates rather than traders.
episodes.title: The Last Outpost

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise is ordered to undergo a series of tests that will propel the ship at unfathomable speed.
episodes.title: Where No One Has Gone Before

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise provides transportation to two delegations who are constantly at odds with each other.
episodes.title: Lonely Among Us

episodes.synopsis: After dropping off some colonists in a nearby system, the crew visits a world of beautiful, healthy and tanned human-looking people.
episodes.title: Justice

episodes.synopsis: After waiting for a response to their hails for three days, Capt. Picard finds that the Ferengi have discovered the Stargazer, his old ship.
episodes.title: The Battle

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise encounters Q again, and he tempts Riker by endowing him with the powers of the Q.
episodes.title: Hide and Q

episodes.synopsis: While on a mission to a planet called Haven, Troi meets her husband-to-be -- a marriage arranged by her father years before.
episodes.title: Haven

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard and some of his crew are caught in a deadly trap on the holodeck as the result of a ship-wide scan from an alien race.
episodes.title: The Big Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise visits the planet where Data was created and discovers another android like him, but when he's assembled, he's not exactly like him.
episodes.title: Datalore

episodes.synopsis: Riker, Troi, Data and Yar beam down to a planet ruled by a matriarchal government in the hopes of locating a missing freighter crew.
episodes.title: Angel One

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise docks at a starbase for repairs, where it is commandeered by a race of technologically linked aliens.
The Enterprise transports an elderly Starfleet Admiral to negotiate a hostage crisis.
episodes.title: Too Short a Season

episodes.synopsis: A planet that was able to cloak itself for thousands of years suddenly reveals itself, with its inhabitants proposing peace.
episodes.title: When The Bough Breaks

episodes.synopsis: The crew visits Velara III, where a group of terraformers work to transform the seemingly desolate planet into one capable of supporting life.
episodes.title: Home Soil

episodes.synopsis: While Wesley Crusher takes a Starflet entrance exam, Capt. Picard and the Enterprise are subjected to an investigation by Starfleet.
episodes.title: Coming of Age

episodes.synopsis: Worf must choose between his loyalty to Starfleet and his Klingon heritage when two Klingon fugitives take over the Enterprise.
episodes.title: Heart of Glory

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the disappearance of the USS Drake on the planet Minos, the crew battles floating mechanical death spheres.
episodes.title: The Arsenal of Freedom

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise encounters two cultures -- one suffering from a plague, the other marketing a cure -- and learn that nothing is as simple as it seems.
episodes.title: Symbiosis

episodes.synopsis: While the Enterprise is en route to rendezvous with Troi's shuttlecraft, a bizarre malfunction causes the transport vehicle to crash on Vagra II.
episodes.title: Skin of Evil

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise races against time when a scientist experiments with time, and claims to have opened a window into another dimension.
episodes.title: We'll Always Have Paris

episodes.synopsis: After diverting to a secret meeting with an old friend and some of Starfleet's finest commanders, Capt. Picard finds the USS Horatio destroyed.
episodes.title: Conspiracy

episodes.synopsis: Waiting for Capt. Picard's return from a Federation conference, the Enterprise crew discovers a disabled 20th-century Earth satellite.
episodes.title: The Neutral Zone

episodes.synopsis: Troi is impregnated by a unknown alien life-form, and Dr. Katherine Pulaski joins the Enterprise as the ship's new Chief Medical Officer.
episodes.title: The Child

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a mysterious void in space and when they move in closer to investigate further, it envelops them and they can't get out.
episodes.title: Where Silence Has Lease

episodes.synopsis: When the crew has a bit of leisure time, La Forge programs the holodeck to create a Sherlock Holmes mystery for Data to unravel.
episodes.title: Elementary, Dear Data

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise rescues the captain of a broken-down freighter, only to become involved in a dispute between feuding worlds.
episodes.title: The Outrageous Okona

episodes.synopsis: The crew ferries a deaf, telepathic mediator to Solais V to negotiate an end to a civil war.
episodes.title: Loud As a Whisper

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise responds to a request for medical assistance from Dr. Ira Graves, considered by many to be the greatest living mind in the universe.
episodes.title: The Schizoid Man

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise receives a distress signal from the USS Lantree. When they arrive, they find everyone aboard the Lantree dead from old age.
episodes.title: Unnatural Selection

episodes.synopsis: When the Federation promotes an officer exchange program, Riker decides to accept an assignment aboard a Klingon warship.
episodes.title: A Matter of Honor

episodes.synopsis: Data resigns his commission rather than be dismantled for examination by an inadequately skilled scientist.
episodes.title: The Measure of a Man

episodes.synopsis: Wesley Crusher suffers from the pangs of first love when the Enterprise is tasked to transport a young woman, Salia, back to her home.
episodes.title: The Dauphin

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard and the crew respond to a distress call from the Enterprise's sister ship the USS Yamato.
episodes.title: Contagion

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise investigates strange debris in orbit around a nearby planet only to find a piece of a NASA spacecraft emblazoned with the US flag.
episodes.title: The Royale

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise comes across a Federation shuttlecraft that is floating in space and without much power but does exhibit life signs.
episodes.title: Time Squared

episodes.synopsis: Riker's delight at being offered command of the USS Aries turns to frustration when the man sent to prepare him is his estranged father.
episodes.title: The Icarus Factor

episodes.synopsis: Upon arriving at a newly identified planetary group, the crew finds that the entire region is unstable.
episodes.title: Pen Pals

episodes.synopsis: Q tries to prove that Capt. Picard needs him on the crew by hurling the Enterprise 7,000 light years away, where they first encounter the Borg.
episodes.title: Q-Who?

episodes.synopsis: With Capt. Picard away for routine surgery, the Enterprise responds to a distress call from a Pakled vessel.
episodes.title: Samaritan Snare

episodes.synopsis: When Starfleet receives an old Earth distress signal from deep in space, the Enterprise is sent to investigate.
episodes.title: Up the Long Ladder

episodes.synopsis: Troi is more than just a little embarrassed when her mother, Lwaxanna -- as outrageous as ever -- arrives on board the Enterprise.
episodes.title: Manhunt

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise is ordered to proceed to an emergency rendezvous to collect a special envoy who is traveling from Starbase 153 to meet them.
episodes.title: The Emissary

episodes.synopsis: The crew participates in a battle exercise, pitting Capt. Picard against Riker. Yet they are all caught off guard when the Ferengi arrive.
episodes.title: Peak Performance

episodes.synopsis: Riker returns from an away team mission wounded and infected with microbes from the planet below, and is soon in a coma in sick bay.
episodes.title: Shades of Gray

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion.
episodes.title: Evolution

episodes.synopsis: After a century of silence, the Enterprise receives a message from the Sheliac system informing them that they have discovered a human colony.
episodes.title: The Ensigns of Command

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise responds to a distress call from Rana IV, a Federation colony that is under attack from an unknown alien ship.
episodes.title: The Survivors

episodes.synopsis: A proto-Vulcan culture worships Capt. Picard as if he were a god, and they prepare to offer a sacrifice in his honor.
episodes.title: Who Watches the Watchers

episodes.synopsis: A startling surprise awaits the crew of the Enterprise when a mission costs the life of a crew member, who left her son behind.
episodes.title: The Bonding

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise picks up ancient radio signal code from the ruined planet Orelious IX, a remnant of a total war over 1,000 years ago.
episodes.title: Booby Trap

episodes.synopsis: La Forge gets left behind on a storm-plagued planet when the rest of his team encounters a Romulan warrior.
episodes.title: The Enemy

episodes.synopsis: While the Enterprise hosts negotiations for control of a stable wormhole, Troi forms a personal relationship with an opposing negotiator.
episodes.title: The Price

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise pursues a race of "gatherers" who continue to raid Federation outposts, unaware of the dangers lurking among them.
episodes.title: The Vengeance Factor

episodes.synopsis: When a Romulan officer defects to the Federation with a warning of a impending invasion, Capt. Picard struggles to decide if he is to be believed.
episodes.title: The Defector

episodes.synopsis: Investigating a planet applying for membership into the Federation, the crew of the Enterprise finds a group of inhabitants who used to be soldiers.
episodes.title: The Hunted

episodes.synopsis: While visiting a planet under civil war, Dr. Crusher is taken hostage by an opposing faction of the planet's ruling government.
episodes.title: The High Ground

episodes.synopsis: Much to Capt. Picard's displeasure, Q reappears on the Enterprise claiming to have been ejected from the Q Continuum and stripped of his powers.
episodes.title: Deja Q

episodes.synopsis: The widow of respected scientist Dr. Nel Apgar accuses Riker of seducing her and killing her husband.
episodes.title: A Matter of Perspective

episodes.synopsis: When the long-lost Enterprise C enters the Enterprise D's time and space continuum, an alternate history places the crew at war with the Klingons.
episodes.title: Yesterday's Enterprise

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to further his creator's work and perpetuate his species, Data creates an android named Lal.
episodes.title: The Offspring

episodes.synopsis: A Klingon commander boards the Enterprise in an officer exchange program initiated by Starfleet, much to the chagrin of the crew.
episodes.title: Sins of the Father

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard is kidnapped and held with three different aliens; meanwhile, he is replaced aboard the Enterprise by an imposter.
episodes.title: Allegiance

episodes.synopsis: After mediating a treaty, Capt. Picard is encouraged to take a much needed vacation -- yet his efforts to rest are repeatedly interrupted.
episodes.title: Captain's Holiday

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise reaches out to an alien being while dancing around with the Romulans, who want to reach it first.
episodes.title: Tin Man

episodes.synopsis: A shy member of the Enterprise crew becomes addicted to the holodeck, where relationships are easier there than in real life.
episodes.title: Hollow Pursuits

episodes.synopsis: After the crew transports a dangerous material to the Enterprise, a collector carries out an intiricate plan to kidnap Data.
episodes.title: The Most Toys

episodes.synopsis: Legendary Federation ambassador Sarek visits the Enterprise to conclude peace talks with a race called the Legarans.
episodes.title: Sarek

episodes.synopsis: When Troi's mother spurns advances made by a Ferengi, DaiMon, he takes it upon himself to kidnap both mother and daughter.
episodes.title: Menage a Troi

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise finds a deserted planet and a downed ship's lone survivor, who has no memory but possesses extraordinary healing powers.
episodes.title: Transfigurations

episodes.synopsis: Responding to a distress call on one of the Federation's outer-most colonies, the Enterprise arrives and must face a powerful foe.
episodes.title: The Best of Both Worlds: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As acting captain, Commander Riker has no choice but to fire full force on the Borg starship, despite Capt. Picard being on board.
episodes.title: The Best of Both Worlds: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise returns to Earth for shore leave. Still recovering from his experience with the Borg, Picard meets up with his brother.
episodes.title: Family

episodes.synopsis: After an accident aboard the Enterprise leaves one of its children in danger, Data commandeers the ship to take him to an unknown destination.
episodes.title: Brothers

episodes.synopsis: On a rescue mission to a Talarian shipwreck, they discover one of the alien crew happens to be a young human.
episodes.title: Suddenly Human

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Crusher's anxiety over losing loved ones is magnified when she becomes trapped in an alternate reality.
episodes.title: Remember Me

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crewmate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.
episodes.title: Legacy

episodes.synopsis: When the head of the Klingon high council passes on, Capt. Picard finds himself in the middle of the struggle for the now-vacant position.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Riker has to leave his birthday party early to head an away team after a Romulan secret base is found on a planet which was believed uninhabited.
episodes.title: Future Imperfect

episodes.synopsis: Before leaving for Starfleet Academy, Wesley Crusher accompanies Capt. Picard at the negotiation proceedings of a mining dispute.
episodes.title: Final Mission

episodes.synopsis: While the Enterprise struggles to contend with a mysterious life-form, Troi inexplicably loses her empathetic powers.
episodes.title: The Loss

episodes.synopsis: Data tries to comprehend the complex emotions between O'Brien and Keiko, who are about to be married.
episodes.title: Data's Day

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard races against time to find out the facts behind a Cardassian commander's claim that the Federation attacked one of their outposts.
episodes.title: The Wounded

episodes.synopsis: While answering a distress call, Capt. Picard finds himself dealing with a person who claims to be the planet's version of the Devil.
episodes.title: Devil's Due

episodes.synopsis: After passing through a wormhole, the crew uncovers clues that they were unconscious for more than the 30 seconds they were led to believe.
episodes.title: Clues

episodes.synopsis: Surgically altered to appear like a local, Riker has been on an acculturation mission under an alias for months on the Arkonian planet.
episodes.title: First Contact

episodes.synopsis: While the Enterprise is in a starbase, La Forge gets a very special visitor: brilliant engineering designer Dr. Leah Brahms.
episodes.title: Galaxy's Child

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise has finally tracked down the missing starship USS Brattain, but Troi senses trouble with the life on board.
episodes.title: Night Terrors

episodes.synopsis: La Forge's friend Leijten expresses concern about the whereabouts of their former crewmates. Soon both begin suffering worrisome ailments.
episodes.title: Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: When assigned to investigate an unknown probe, Lt. Barclay receives an unexplainable boost of confidence and a vast increase in his knowledge.
episodes.title: The Nth Degree

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise is at Tagus III to host the Federation archaeologists council's annual symposium, where Capt. Picard is to give the keynote lecture.
episodes.title: Qpid

episodes.synopsis: A retired admiral boards the Enterprise in an effort to determine the actions aboard the ship surrounding an act of sabotage and possible treason.
episodes.title: The Drumhead

episodes.synopsis: Troi's mother visits the Enterprise and becomes infatuated with a man whose culture forces him into a suicidal ritual called the Resolution.
episodes.title: Half A Life

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Crusher falls for a Trill ambassador, but learns that this kind of life-form is not at all what they appear to be.
episodes.title: The Host

episodes.synopsis: La Forge is brainwashed by the Romulans to assassinate a Klingon ambassador.
episodes.title: The Mind's Eye

episodes.synopsis: When a female crewmember is infatuated with Data, he decides to give a romantic relationship a try.
episodes.title: In Theory

episodes.synopsis: Both Capt. Picard and Lt. Worf must decide where their priorities lie as the Klingon Empire descends into civil war.
episodes.title: Redemption: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Worf fights in the Klingon Civil War, Capt. Picard and his crew must stop the Romulans from helping their pawns win it.
episodes.title: Redemption: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard must learn to communicate with a race who speaks in a language that is not compatible with the universal translator.
episodes.title: Darmok

episodes.synopsis: A new officer, Ensign Ro, is enlisted to track down a band of Bajoran terrorists. Yet Ro, a Bajoran herself, must first win her crewmates' trust.
episodes.title: Ensign Ro

episodes.synopsis: Riker, Data, Crusher and other crewmembers are enjoying a recreational day on an Earth-like human colony when they are hit by an electrical storm.
episodes.title: Silicon Avatar

episodes.synopsis: When the Enterprise's systems are disrupted after hitting a quantum filament, Troi is left in command while Capt. Picard is stuck in the turbolift.
episodes.title: Disaster

episodes.synopsis: Wesley Crusher returns to the Enterprise on vacation from Starfleet Academy, only to discover the crew is acting mysteriously.
episodes.title: The Game

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard and Data follow Spock into Romulan space on a dangerous mission.
episodes.title: Unification: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Senator Pardek finds Capt. Picard on Romulus and brings him to ambassador Spock, who explains about the chance of a Vulcan-Romulan reunification.
episodes.title: Unification: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Reaching Panthera IV after an asteroid wreaks havoc of catastrophic proportions, the Enterprise crew deals with trying to save the planet.
episodes.title: A Matter of Time

episodes.synopsis: Worf's mother boards the Enterprise with his son and news that Worf's human parents can no longer care for him.
episodes.title: New Ground

episodes.synopsis: Data rescues a boy, and in a way to repress his own pain, the boy begins to mimic Data's personality.
episodes.title: Hero Worship

episodes.synopsis: Transporting three Ullian mind-probing historians, the Enterprise crew is stymied when some of its members fall into a coma.
episodes.title: Violations

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise is on a mission to warn the human colony on planet Moab IV about a massive stellar fragment that's approaching.
episodes.title: The Masterpiece Society

episodes.synopsis: When an approaching alien ship wipes their memory, the crew struggles to put back together what happened.
episodes.title: Conundrum

episodes.synopsis: A long-lost ship is found on a planet where cosmic storms prevented detection for 200 years.
episodes.title: Power Play

episodes.synopsis: After an accident that leaves him no longer able to walk, Worf asks Riker to help him commit suicide.
episodes.title: Ethics

episodes.synopsis: Riker falls for a member of an androgynous race, who lost a couple of their people in an unmapped region of space.
episodes.title: The Outcast

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise gets caught in a time loop which always has one result: total destruction of the ship.
episodes.title: Cause and Effect

episodes.synopsis: Wesley Crusher's team has an accident at Starfleet Aacademy. Capt. Picard offers to help a Starfleet investigation into what happened.
episodes.title: The First Duty

episodes.synopsis: Shortly after the Enterprise saves a planet from an asteroid impact by destroying it, the ship begins experiencing strange breakdowns.
episodes.title: Cost of Living

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise is unwittingly used to present a unique gift to an alien race: a beautiful empath whose sole purpose is to please her mate.
episodes.title: The Perfect Mate

episodes.synopsis: A child who recently moved onto the Enterprise begins playing with an imaginary friend, but the new playmate begins affecting the ship's operations.
episodes.title: Imaginary Friend

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise finds a lone Borg drone, separated from the collective, and brings him aboard.
episodes.title: I, Borg

episodes.synopsis: When the Enterprise responds to a Romulan ship's disress call, Ensign Ro and La Forge are lost in a transporter malfunction.
episodes.title: The Next Phase

episodes.synopsis: Picard awakens to find himself in a village where he is a well-known member of the community suffering from a delusion of being a starship captain.
episodes.title: The Inner Light

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise is called upon by scientists to return to Earth when there is evidence that aliens had visited the planet in the late 1800s.
episodes.title: Time's Arrow: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard and the crew follow Data back to the 1800s to get him back, only to find the suspected alien visitors killing people of that time period.
episodes.title: Time's Arrow: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Overcoming his fear of transporter, Lt. Barclay joins an away team, only to have visions of something in the beam with him.
episodes.title: Realm of Fear

episodes.synopsis: When the Enterprise comes to the rescue of an ambassador and his mother, Troi finds herself attracted to him.
episodes.title: Man of the People

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise stumbles upon a Dyson Sphere, with a ship crashed on the outer surface.
episodes.title: Relics

episodes.synopsis: Commander Riker and other members of the crew are unable to find rest, putting the Enterprise on the trail of a mystery.
episodes.title: Schisms

episodes.synopsis: When an honor student in the medical field is assigned to the Enterprise as an intern, she begins to demonstrate powers of the Q.
episodes.title: True Q

episodes.synopsis: Returning to the Enterprise with three others from the planet Marlonia, Capt. Picard's shuttle is disintegrated by an energy field.
episodes.title: Rascals

episodes.synopsis: While the crew is experiencing some much needed down time, Worf and his son go on an Old West excursion on the holodeck.
episodes.title: A Fistful of Datas

episodes.synopsis: When La Forge is assigned to survey a new mining development, Dr. Farallon uses her new robot, called an Exocomp, to repair a power grid.
episodes.title: The Quality of Life

episodes.synopsis: Picard is replaced as captain of the Enterprise so he, Worf and Dr. Crusher can go on a secret mission into Cardassian space.
episodes.title: Chain of Command: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While the humorless Capt. Jellico leads an effort to prevent a Cardassian invasion, the captured Capt. Picard is tortured by an interrogation expert.
episodes.title: Chain of Command: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Diagnosing anomalies in the recreative Sherlock Holmes hologram game programs, Lt. Barclay awakens Professor Moriarty.
episodes.title: Ship in a Bottle

episodes.synopsis: Murderous intrigue abounds for the Enterprise when one of the crew aboard a subspace communications station is believed dead.
episodes.title: Aquiel

episodes.synopsis: Troi awakens to find herself altered to look like a Romulan, unaware she's involved in a cat-and-mouse game as a member of their intelligence agency.
episodes.title: Face of the Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard incurs serious wounds in a fight, and his artificial heart is gravely damaged.
episodes.title: Tapestry

episodes.synopsis: Worf is offered coordinates by a Eurydian who claims that his father didn't die in battle but is in a Romulan prison camp.
episodes.title: Birthright: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Having discovered survivors from the Romulan attack on Khitomer, Worf resists becoming one of them, even though he becomes a prisoner himself.
episodes.title: Birthright: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard is trapped aboard the Enterprise while the ship is docked for a lethal maintenance procedure.
episodes.title: Starship Mine

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard falls for the new head of the stellar science department, but has misgivings when he's forced to assign her to a dangerous mission.
episodes.title: Lessons

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise races to uncover an archaeological secret which also attracts the attention of the Klingons and the Cardassians.
episodes.title: The Chase

episodes.synopsis: Riker begins to question reality when he finds himself in an insane asylum and faces the prospect that his life on the Enterprise is a delusion.
episodes.title: Frame of Mind

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Crusher puts her career on the line to prove a scientist's theoretical new shielding technology which may have cost him his life.
episodes.title: Suspicions

episodes.synopsis: After being distracted while on duty, Worf is placed on leave and given time to get his personal affairs in order.
episodes.title: Rightful Heir

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise returns to an abandoned outpost that is accessible only once every eight years -- and finds a familiar face.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard, La Forge, Data and Troi experience strange instances where either one or several of them appear to be frozen in time.
episodes.title: Timescape

episodes.synopsis: During an encounter with the Borg, Data feels his first emotion when he gets angry with the cybernetic race.
episodes.title: Descent: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard, La Forge and Troi try to find a way to escape their cell after being imprisoned by Lore.
episodes.title: Descent: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise enters into a diplomatic mission and find the ambassadors are making life aboard the ship difficult.
episodes.title: Liaisons

episodes.synopsis: La Forge is distracted by the news of his missing mother while he uses a new remote probe technology to search for a downed spacecraft.
episodes.title: Interface

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the death of Capt. Picard, Riker is abducted by a group of intergalactic archaeological thieves.
episodes.title: Gambit: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Riker and Picard must find out why an intergalactic gang is looting archaeological sites.
episodes.title: Gambit: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Data deals with his new ability to experience nightmares as the Enterprise deals with the installation of a warp core that doesn't work as expected.
episodes.title: Phantasms

episodes.synopsis: While establishing diplomatic relations with an alien race called the Cairn, Deanna's mother experiences a mental breakdown and falls into a coma.
episodes.title: Dark Page

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard and Dr. Crusher discover things about one another when they are captured by an alien race.
episodes.title: Attached

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise is accosted by scientists from a nearby planet who claim that cumulative exposure to warp energy is weakening the fabric of space.
episodes.title: Force of Nature

episodes.synopsis: On Federation planet Atrea IV, Data encounters a woman who claims to be his mother, the former wife of his creator.
episodes.title: Inheritance

episodes.synopsis: Upon his return from a bat'leth competition in the Klingon Empire, Worf notices changes among the Enterprise crew.
episodes.title: Parallels

episodes.synopsis: Riker finds out his former commander from the starship Pegasus has orders that entail more than what is revealed to Capt. Picard.
episodes.title: The Pegasus

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to preserve a race of people from being bombarded by deadly storms, Worf's foster brother violates the Prime Directive.
episodes.title: Homeward

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Crusher meets a man from her deceased grandmother's past when she tries to put her affairs in order.
episodes.title: Sub Rosa

episodes.synopsis: Questions of duty and honor arise amongst some junior officers as they question the actions of the Enterprise command crew.
episodes.title: Lower Decks

episodes.synopsis: Data is sent to follow a probe that has drifted off course and crashed on a primitive planet, only to crash on the planet himself and lose his memory.
episodes.title: Thine Own Self

episodes.synopsis: While an alien archive transforms the Enterprise into its ancient society, Data is taken over by personalities from the extinct civilization.
episodes.title: Masks

episodes.synopsis: Troi deals with the feelings that are overwhelming her as she and Worf begin to form a relationship.
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard and Data return to the Enterprise to find the entire crew in various states of devolution.
episodes.title: Genesis

episodes.synopsis: The Cardassians grant the Federation access to Dorvan V, where Capt. Picard must relocate the Native American Indians who have migrated there.
episodes.title: Journey's End

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to help him accept his Klingon heritage, Worf and his son, Alexander, attend an ancient Klingon ceremony.
episodes.title: First Born

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard races the Ferengi in an effort to track down the son he never knew he had.
episodes.title: Bloodlines

episodes.synopsis: Data and the rest of the crew discover that the ship's computer is exhibiting strange behavior as it begins to become self-aware.
episodes.title: Emergence

episodes.synopsis: Ensign Ro is sent to infiltrate the Maquis and finds herself torn between her loyalty to Starfleet and her sympathy for the Maquis.
episodes.title: Preemptive Strike

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Picard finds himself shifting continually into the past, future and present, and must discover a threat to humanity's existence.
episodes.title: All Good Things...: Parts 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: Join Jonathan Frakes, Next Generation's Commander Riker, for this fascinating chronicle of Gene Roddenberry's beloved, Emmy Award-winning series.
episodes.title: Star Trek Next Generation Retrospective
